content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]

thought: To craft a redstone torch, I need to craft a stick and jungle planks. To craft jungle planks, I need to place a stripped jungle log in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the stripped jungle log from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]
thought: Since the jungle planks have been crafted, I need to move them to an inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]
thought: Now I need to craft the stick. To do this, I need to place 1 jungle plank in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]

thought: Since the jungle plank has been placed in the crafting table, I need to move the remaining jungle planks to the crafting table to craft the stick. Therefore I will move the jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]
thought: Since the stick has been crafted, I need to move it to an inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]
thought: Now I need to craft the redstone torch. To do this, I need to place 1 redstone and 1 stick in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the redstone from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}]
thought: Since the redstone has been placed in the crafting table, I need to move the stick to the crafting table to craft the redstone torch. Therefore I will move the stick from slot 13 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_torch
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}]
thought: Since the redstone torch has been crafted, I need to move it to an inventory slot (eg., 15).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 15 with quantity 1
